phrs.translation: 盔甲武士, 地狱的, 斯提吉安, 幽灵

sentences.sentence: A power failure at 11:03 P. M. plunged the city into Stygian blackness.
sentences.translation: 晚上11：03停电，使全市陷入了阴森森的黑暗中。

sentences.sentence: The grand prize is a special housing plot in the mysterious Stygian Abyss!
sentences.translation: 最大奖是一个位在神秘的冥河深渊特殊的居住区块！

sentences.sentence: He faces the task of the legendary Hercules rivals remove the debris 10 years Stygian stables Malaysia.
sentences.translation: 他面临着传说中的大力士对手的任务清理堆积十年冥河马来西亚马厩。
